frameDefinitions: A Perpetrator intentionally sets fire to his own or someone else's property, often in order to collect an insurance payment on this property.
Words in this frame describe acts in violation of a legal code.
A Dodger acts to avoid an oncoming moving Bad_entity.
These are words describing situations in which a Perpetrator takes Goods from a  Victim or a Source.

The words in this frame describe situations in which the Perpetrator has sexual intercourse with the Victim forcibly (or by threatening the use of force) and without his or her consent. '' 'Does the press make it more difficult for raped women to obtain justice?'
A Terrorist commits a violent or otherwise harmful Act upon a Victim in order to coerce or terrorize a government or populace.
frameExamples: He was accused of <t><fex name='Offense'>hijacking</fex></t> a tour bus full of people.
Mo <t>dodged</t>  the flower pot that Larry threw in disgust.
I can't believe he <t>pickpocketed</t> my gold watch !
Does the press make it more difficult for <t>raped</t> women to obtain justice?
Their <t>terrorism</t> against civilians will not be tolerated.
listRoleDefinitions: The illegal setting of fire to destroy something.
The <fen>Perpetrator</fen> sets fire to a building in order to gain some benefit from so doing.
<fen>Victim</fen> identifies the enity that is negatively effected by the arson.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the arson occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the arson occurs.
The illegal act.
This role denotes the person or entity that is badly affected by the <fen>Offense</fen>.
The individual who commits the Offense
The <fen>Dodger</fen> acts to avoid an oncoming <fen>Bad_entity</fen>.
The <fen>Bad_entity</fen> is  the oncoming entity to avoid.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the dodging occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the dodging occurs.
<fen>Perpetrator</fen> is the person (or other agent) that takes the goods away.
<fen>Victim</fen> is the person (or other sentient being or group) that owns the goods before they are taken away by the perpetrator.
<fen>Goods</fen> is anything (including labor, time, or legal rights) that can be taken away.
<fen>Source</fen> is the initial location of the goods, before they change location.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the theft occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the theft occurs.
This is the person who forces another person to have sexual intercourse with him or her against the other person's will.
This is the person who is forced to engage in sexual intercourse against his or her will.
The rape of a <fen>Victim</fen> by the <fen>Perpetrator</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The <fen>Terrorist</fen> commits the <fen>Act</fen> of terror for political or ideological gains.
The <fen>Act</fen> is the harmful action performed by the <fen>Terrorist</fen> or terrorist organization.
The <fen>Victim</fen> is most directly affected or harmed by the <fen>Act</fen> of terrorism.
The location in time when the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
The location where the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The two men</fex> were charged with arson when found running from the burning factory.
There has been an increase in the number of  arson attacks <fex>on local schools</fex>.
The police is investigating the homicide <fex>of Dr. Johnson</fex>.
<fex>Mo</fex> dodged the flower pot that Larry threw in disgust.
Mo dodged <fex> the flower pot that Larry threw in disgust</fex>.
Leslie stole the watch <fex>from the table</fex>.
Leslie STOLE the watch from Kim <fex>at dusk</fex>.
Leslie STOLE the watch from Kim <fex>in the park</fex>.
The lawyer said the woman was raped <fex>on a night of madness</fex>
Several domestic <fex>terrorists</fex> were operating from the site during the mid 1990s.
Many have suffered due to their acts of <fex><t>terrorism</t></fex>.
Cowardly acts of terrorism <fex>upon innocent men, women, and children</fex> is not a doorway to Heaven, but a gateway to Hell.
